content.question: Write the shortenMessage method, which returns a shortened version of the parameter message with all substrings that are equal to the parameter str removed. If str does not appear in message, the original value of message is returned. For example, shortenMessage("the_driver_of_the_first_car_is_Jerry", "the_") should return "driver_of_first_car_is_Jerry". Complete method shortenMessage. /** * Returns a shortened version of the parameter message with all * substrings that are equal to the parameter str removed, as * described in part (b) * Precondition: There are no overlapping occurrences of str * within message. */ public String shortenMessage(String message, String str)
